posts.post_content:
Hello,

Having unloaded all of my highlanders items, including my other copy of this card, I’m now looking to sell this final piece.  

SGC 20 l, mostly because if the period writing (which I always found neat doe a postcard)


$3300 takes it.   Reasonable offers considered.  

Front pic attached.  Back pic available (but not postable - size apparently matters.   Sigh)
